title: account transfer from oce to na
body: I am trying to change my accout to na but in the store the option to change is not there. Any info as to why its like that?

replies.body: I'm having the same issue. I can't see it in the store and am trying to transfer region...

Hey there,

Region transfers from OCE to other regions are currently disabled, for more information see the below linked thread.
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/f6bvYNQx-important-notice-transfers-disabled-from-sep-14th-to-nov-21st
Me too, Riot just leave my request as solve but nothing happen????????? Rito?????
